about_the_game:
The second installment of yota’s Pop Fantasy series!
This is a professionally re-arranged collection of the “BigMonster” and “NPC Face” materials from the default assets, into a pop, comedy, casual like style!

This set has great synergy with the previous "Butler & Face Set", giving you the option to add to your game a comedy, playful taste to create a “Pop Fantasy”!

*******************************************
Contents
Face: 12 sheets (96 points)
Enemy: 36 items (18 items + 18 items for SV)
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
